trans-unit.source: Specifies the possible alignments with which the items of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Especifica os alinhamentos possíveis com a qual os itens de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> podem ser exibidos.

trans-unit.source: You control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> layout by choosing one of the members of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você controla <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> layout escolhendo um dos membros de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Stack Layouts
trans-unit.target: Layouts de pilha

trans-unit.source: Stacking is the arranging of items beside each other at both ends of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Pilha é a organização de itens ao lado de cada um dos outros em ambas as extremidades do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.

trans-unit.source: The following list describes the stack layouts.
trans-unit.target: A lista a seguir descreve os layouts de pilha.

trans-unit.source: StackWithOverflow is the default.
trans-unit.target: StackWithOverflow é o padrão.

trans-unit.source: This setting causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.StackWithOverflow> to alter its layout automatically in accordance with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> property to handle dragging and docking scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Essa configuração faz com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.StackWithOverflow> para alterar seu layout automaticamente de acordo com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> propriedade tratar arrastando e cenários de encaixe.

trans-unit.source: VerticalStackWithOverflow renders the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> items beside each other vertically.
trans-unit.target: VerticalStackWithOverflow renderiza o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> itens verticalmente ao lado do outro.

trans-unit.source: HorizontalStackWithOverflow renders the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.VerticalStackWithOverflow> items beside each other horizontally.
trans-unit.target: HorizontalStackWithOverflow renderiza o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.VerticalStackWithOverflow> itens ao lado de cada um dos outros horizontalmente.

trans-unit.source: Other Features of Stack Layouts
trans-unit.target: Outros recursos de layouts de pilha

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> determines the end of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.HorizontalStackWithOverflow> to which the item is aligned.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> Determina o final do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.HorizontalStackWithOverflow> ao qual o item é alinhado.

trans-unit.source: When items do not fit within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, an overflow button automatically appears.
trans-unit.target: Quando itens não se ajustarem dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, um botão de estouro é exibida automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property setting determines whether an item appears in the overflow area always, as needed, or never.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> propriedade determina se um item é exibido na área de excedentes sempre, conforme o necessário ou nunca.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event, you can inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>, the overflow <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>, or if it is not currently showing at all.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> eventos, você pode inspecionar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> propriedade para determinar se um item foi colocado na principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>, o estouro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>, ou se ele não estiver sendo exibido em todos os.

trans-unit.source: The typical reasons why an item is not displayed are that the item did not fit on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property was set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow>.
trans-unit.target: As razões comuns por que um item não é exibido são que o item não se ajustou no principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> e sua <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> propriedade foi definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow>.

trans-unit.source: Make a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> movable by putting it in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> and setting its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripStyle%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Fazer um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> podem ser movidos, colocando-o um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> e configuração de seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.GripStyle%2A> para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle>.

trans-unit.source: Other Layout Options
trans-unit.target: Outras opções de layout

trans-unit.source: The other layout options are Flow and Table.
trans-unit.target: As outras opções de layout são fluxo e a tabela.

trans-unit.source: Flow Layout
trans-unit.target: Layout de fluxo

trans-unit.source: Flow layout is the default for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>.
trans-unit.target: Layout de fluxo é o padrão para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>.

trans-unit.source: It is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: É semelhante do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>.

trans-unit.source: The features of Flow layout are as follows:
trans-unit.target: Os recursos de layout de fluxo são da seguinte maneira:

trans-unit.source: All of the features of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> are exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Todos os recursos de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> são expostas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: You must cast the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings> class to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings> class.
trans-unit.target: Você deve converter o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings> de classe para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings> classe.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> properties in code to align the items within the row.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> propriedades em código para alinhar itens dentro da linha.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> é ignorada.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event, you can inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> or did not fit.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> eventos, você pode inspecionar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> propriedade para determinar se um item foi colocado na principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> ou não se encaixam.

trans-unit.source: The grip is not rendered, and therefore a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> in Flow layout style in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> cannot be moved.
trans-unit.target: A alça não é processada e, portanto, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> no estilo de layout de fluxo em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> não pode ser movido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> overflow button is not rendered, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> botão de estouro não é processado, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> é ignorado.

trans-unit.source: Table Layout
trans-unit.target: Layout da tabela

trans-unit.source: Table layout is the default for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Layout de tabela é o padrão para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.

trans-unit.source: It is similar to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Ele é semelhante a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.

trans-unit.source: The features of Table layout are as follows:
trans-unit.target: Os recursos de layout de tabela são como segue:

trans-unit.source: All of the features of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> are exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Todos os recursos de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> são expostas pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutSettings%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: You must cast the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings> class to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings> class.
trans-unit.target: Você deve converter o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings> de classe para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings> classe.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> properties in code to align the items within the table cell.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> propriedades em código para alinhar itens dentro da célula de tabela.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Alignment%2A> é ignorada.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event, you can inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table> or did not fit.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> eventos, você pode inspecionar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> propriedade para determinar se um item foi colocado na principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table> ou não se encaixam.

trans-unit.source: The grip is not rendered, and therefore a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> in Table layout style in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> cannot be moved.
trans-unit.target: A alça não é processada e, portanto, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> no estilo de layout de tabela em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> não pode ser movido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> overflow button is not rendered, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> botão de estouro não é processado, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> é ignorado.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items flow horizontally or vertically as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que os itens fluem horizontalmente ou verticalmente conforme necessário.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out horizontally and overflow as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que os itens são dispostos horizontalmente e estouram conforme necessário.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out automatically.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que os itens são dispostos automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out flush left.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que os itens são dispostos com recuo à esquerda.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that items are laid out vertically, are centered within the control, and overflow as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que os itens são dispostos verticalmente, centralizados dentro do controle e estouram conforme necessário.
